economic.title: Budget 2020: Solar pump scheme may be good for farmers, but is susceptible to misuse
economic.content: When a farmer uses conventional electricity, he pays a subsidised tariff and so will be careful about wasting power. Since solar pumps have no billing, he will tend to leave his pump on, draining more of precious ground water.

economic.title: Gun shots heard in Shaheen Bagh area, police detain shooter: Reports
economic.content: The incident comes two days after a man had opened fire at at protesters, who were agitating against CAA near the Jamia Millia Islamia University in Delhi

economic.title: Budget 2020: Investors lose Rs 3.55 lakh cr in equities in just a day
economic.content: Technically, Ajit Mishra of Religare Broking feels the way benchmark ended, indications are pointing towards further fall, with some intermediate pause.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Will the new tax regime put auto demand on a better footing?
Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharman proposes debt ETFs comprising government securities
economic.content: The government had announced plans for debt ETFs in Budget 2019 and the first corporate ETF called Bharat Bond ETF, managed by Edelweiss Mutual Fund, was launched in December.

economic.title: Budget to provide unprecedented relief to taxpayers: Home Minister Amit Shah
economic.content: In a series of tweets, Shah also said world-class highways, railways, ports, airports, metros will be built in the country with the allocation of Rs 100 lakh crore.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt has given up on reviving economy, accelerating growth, creating jobs: Chidambaram
economic.content: There is nothing in the Budget that leads one to believe that growth will revive in 2020-21 and the claim of 6 to 6.5 per cent growth next year is "astonishing and even irresponsible", the former finance minister said at a press conference.

economic.title: Budget 'development-oriented', will spur job creation: UP CM Yogi Adityanath
economic.content: Adityanath further said the Budget is as per the current needs of the country and will provide strengthen the country's economy.

economic.title: Budget 2020: HDFC's Deepak Parekh says markets disappointed, no specific incentives for manufacturing or real estate
economic.content: Other than extending the exemption limit for higher deduction for one more year, the budget has given tax-free for the developers for one more year for affordable housing, Parekh said.

economic.title: India Inc terms Budget as growth provoking, says implementation crucial
economic.content: Soon after Sitharaman unveiled the Union Budget for 2020-21 in Parliament woven around the themes of aspirational India, and economic development for all and caring society, India Inc took to Twitter to share views on the announcements.

economic.title: Hyundai sales dip 3% in January
economic.content: Domestic sales were down 8.3 percent to 42,002 units as against 45,803 units in January 2019, the company added.

economic.title: Budget 2020: India’s deposit coverage per capita compares favourably to that of developed economies
economic.content: Deposit insurance coverage as a ratio of per capita income is now 4.1 times

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt intends to remove all income tax exemptions in long run: FM
economic.content: Speaking at a press conference after presenting her second budget in the Lok Sabha, she said income tax cuts follow reduction in corporate tax rates in September last year.

economic.title: Budget 2020: IT, Teck indices buck the trend to close 1% higher
economic.content: The government said that a policy will be brought in to allow the private sector to build data center parks

economic.title: Ammonia gas leak in Noida: 1 dead, 300 evacuated
economic.content: The leakage was reported around 12 pm, prompting immediate deployment of police force, firefighters and the NDRF

economic.title: Budget 2020: ACs, refrigerator, some fans set to become expensive
economic.content: The customs duty has been hiked from 10 percent to 12.5 percent for compressors in ACs and refrigerators with immediate effect.

economic.title: Budget most disappointing for Mumbai, Maharashtra: Congress
economic.content: On the other hand, the opposition BJP in Maharashtra hailed the Budget 2020-21, saying it strengthens the economy and makes provision for the welfare of all.

economic.title: No substantial relief visible for telecom sector in Budget: COAI
economic.content: "From what we have seen so far, there appears to be no substantial relief for the telecom sector. Of course, we are waiting to see the details," Cellular Operators Association of India (COAI) Director General Rajan Mathews told PTI.

economic.title: IRCTC's 3rd pvt train to run on Indore-Varanasi route
economic.content: In the last few months, the IRCTC has started operating private trains on two routes -- Delhi-Lucknow and Ahmedabad-Mumbai.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman proposes monetisation of 12 national highways
economic.content: Currently, the funds raised from monetisation of hihways are utilised towards investments in NHAI projects.

economic.title: Employees' unions oppose govt plan to sell shares in LIC
economic.content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said the Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) will be listed as part of the government disinvestment initiative.

economic.title: FM's 16-point plan for agriculture is eyewash: Shiv Sena leader
economic.content: Tiwari said the Union budget did not provide any solution to address core issues related to cost, crop, credit and risk management.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt aims to raise fishery exports to Rs 1 lakh crore by 2024-25: FM Sitharaman
economic.content: The government also proposes to put in place a framework for development, management and conservation of marine fishery resources, she added.

economic.title: 5 things you should know about BSVI TVS Apache RR 310
economic.content: TVS has added four riding modes­­ – Rain, Urban, Sport, Track – along with ride-by-wire throttle

economic.title: Royal Enfield Tribute Black Limited edition: Here's all you should know
economic.content: The paint scheme is called Tribute Black and features gloss black body panels with matte black inserts on the tank and battery box

economic.title: Royal Enfield Tribute Black Limited edition: Here's all you should know
economic.content: The paint scheme is called Tribute Black and features gloss black body panels with matte black inserts on the tank and battery box

economic.title: MG confirms 7-seater SUV, will be named Gloster
economic.content: MG could offer the Gloster with BSVI-compliant 2-litre petrol and diesel engine options.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Over Rs 238 crore for Personnel Ministry to train bureaucrats in India and abroad
economic.content: Both the ISTM and the LBSNAA conduct several training programmes for IAS officers and all other levels of secretarial functionaries with exposure to rules, regulations and aptitude.

economic.title: Union Minister Ravi Shankar Prasad reaches out to Shaheen Bagh protesters, says govt 'ready to talk'
economic.content: Prasad said that the Centre is ready to communicate with the protestors, adding a caveat that it should be in a "structured form".

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Step-motherly treatment meted out to Delhi again: CM Arvind Kejriwal
economic.content: The AAP national convenor also asked that if the BJP was disappointing Delhi before the assembly elections, "will it fulfil its promises after the polls?"

economic.title: Budget 2020: Tax dispute resolution and faceless appeals introduced
economic.content: Interest and penalty waived on disputed tax before March 31, 2020

economic.title: Budget 2020: EVs not made in India to get costlier; sales of Hyundai, MG Motors to get hit
economic.content: The customs duty on passenger vehicles (cars, SUVs and vans), bus and trucks, three-wheelers and two wheelers that are brought to India in completely knocked down (CKD) form is proposed to be raised to 15 percent, up from 10 percent presently from April 1.

economic.title: Support measures announced in Budget 2020 to help boost exports: FIEO
economic.content: FIEO said the 'one district one product' idea can be a game-changer for exports.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt to review customs duty exemption by September
economic.content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman while presenting the Budget for 2020-21 said exemptions from customs duty have been given in public interest from time to time.

economic.title: Budget 2020 podcast | LIC disinvestment a surprise move; corporate India cheers for DDT scrapping
economic.content: Moneycontrol's Shraddha Sharma and Prince Thomas discuss the top announcements for the corporate sector and how it will boost the economy.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt estimate Rs 1.33 lakh cr revenue from telecom sector in 2020-21
economic.content: The government in the receipt budget has pegged a revenue collection of Rs 1,33,027.2 crore for financial year 2020-21 under communications head.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM Sitharaman delivers longest Budget speech, breaks own record
economic.content: Sitharaman had to cut short her budget speech as she felt unwell. She had only two pages of her Budget speech unread when she appeared uneasy and was seen wiping sweat from her forehead.

economic.title: Budget 2020 podcast | What the new tax regime means and how it benefits taxpayers
economic.content: Tune in to this exclusive podcast where Moneycontrol's Jerome Anthony talks to Hitesh Gajaria of KPMG to find out all about the new tax regime.

economic.title: No big bang reforms in Budget 2020! Top 5 factors fuelling sell-off in equities
economic.content: Experts see it as a non-event from a market standpoint as the requirement of the hour was much more compared to what the government delivered.

economic.title: Budget 2020 PDF: Here's where you can download FM Nirmala Sitharaman's full speech
economic.content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman tabled the union budget for this year in the Lok Sabha on February 1.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FPI limit increased to 15% in corporate bond to boost bond market, currency, say experts
economic.content: Experts are of the view that the move is a positive one as it will strengthen the segment of the corporate bonds.

economic.title: India's growth, fiscal deficit projections challenging to meet: Moody's analyst
economic.content: India's finance minister, Nirmala Sitharaman, set a fiscal deficit target of 3.5% of GDP for the year ending March 2021 and said it expected nominal GDP of 10%. The government had targeted nominal growth of 12% for the current fiscal year.

economic.title: Nirbhaya case: President Ram Nath Kovind rejects mercy petition of death-row convict Vinay
economic.content: With this, the two of the four convicts have exhausted all legal recourse to escape the gallows.

economic.title: Budget will revive economic growth and create new job opportunities: Rajnath Singh
economic.content: "The first budget of the new decade presented by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman gives an outline of a new and confident India. It is a promising, proactive and progressive budget which will make India healthy and wealthy in coming years," Singh said. ?

economic.title: Budget 2020: Bata India share price gains 2% on custom duty hike on footwear
economic.content: Relaxo Footwears also rallied 2 percent to hit a 52-week high of Rs 754 only to wipe out the gains.

economic.title: Rahul Gandhi says no strategic idea, anything concrete in Budget
economic.content: Talking to reporters outside Parliament soon after the presentation of the budget, he described the budget as repetitive, saying it does not address the main issue of unemployment confronting the country's youth.

economic.title: ITC hits 52-week low after govt proposes to raise excise duty on cigarettes
economic.content: In the quarter ended December 2019, the company received 44 percent revenue from its cigarettes business.

economic.title: India raises import tax on crude palm oil to 44%
economic.content: The hike in import duty on palm oil could prompt buyers to increase purchases of rival edible oils such as soyoil and sunflower oil, traders said.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM Sitharaman pulls the plug on PSU bank recapitalisation
economic.content: The government has already front loaded Rs 68,855 crore, out of Rs 70,000 crore earmarked for capital infusion for the current fiscal, to take care of the mega-merger plan announced in August last year

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt proposes to cut import duty on newsprint to 5%
economic.content: "However, since then I have received several references that this levy has put additional burden on print media at a time when it is going through a difficult phase. I, therefore, propose to reduce basic customs duty on imports of newsprint and light-weight coated paper from 10 per cent to 5 per cent," she said while presenting the Union Budget for 2020-21.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Infra spend may exceed Rs 5 lakh crore
economic.content: In the Budget 2019, the budgetary allocation to the ministry of road transport and highways increased to Rs 83,016 crore in 2019-20 from Rs 78,626, rising by a significant 6 percent.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Text of FM Sitharaman's budget speech
economic.content: Here's the full text of Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's budget speech.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Customs duty on imported wall fans, tableware, kitchenware hiked
economic.content: In Budget 2020-21, Sitharaman also proposed withdrawal of customs duty exemption on raw sugar, agro-animal based products, tuna bait, skimmed milk, certain alcoholic beverages, soya fibre and soya protein.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM announces new scheme to make India a hub for electronic manufacturing
economic.content: India is looking to galvanise smartphone and component manufacturing and position itself as a global hub, dishing out incentives to sweeten the deal for international brands

economic.title: China central bank sees temporary economic impact from virus, pledges support measures
economic.content: In multiple statements issued on Saturday afternoon, the People's Bank of China (PBOC) said that it will appropriately lower lending rates to support firms affected by virus outbreak.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt removes incentives to 'save' in nation with no social security: TMC
economic.content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman introduced new slabs and reduced the tax rate for different slabs for an individual income of up to Rs 15 lakh per annum, if a taxpayer opts for foregoing exemptions and deductions.

economic.title: Congress says Budget 'full of piecemeal measures, repackaged schemes'
economic.content: "The main issue facing is unemployment. I didn't see any strategic idea that would help our youth get jobs," Congress leader Rahul Gandhi said

economic.title: Budget documents laid in Rajya Sabha
economic.content: As the House met after presentation of the budget in Lok Sabha, Sitharaman laid a statement of the estimated receipts and expenditure of the Government for the year 202021.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | At least one major port to be corporatised, listed: FM Nirmala Sitharaman
economic.content: The government has been striving to improve the operational efficiencies of ports through mechanisation, digitisation and process simplification.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Donation details to be pre-filled in tax returns
economic.content: Charitable institutions to provide data and register online

economic.title: Pramod Agrawal takes over as Coal India chairman
economic.content: Agrawal, a 1991 batch IAS officer, was principal secretary for urban development and housing department in Madhya Pradesh.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt introduces five tax slabs with lower rates for those foregoing exemptions
economic.content: The minister further said that the new regime will be optional and the people can continue with old regime if they desire so.

economic.title: Bharat in focus, LIC to hit the market major highlights of FM Nirmala Sitharaman's second Budget
economic.content: In choosing unalloyed reforms when it is facing angry protests over the Citizenship Amendment Act, the government signalled its single-minded intent to engineer a quick turnaround in the economy that has been falling off a cliff.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman cuts short speech after feeling unwell
economic.content: Sitharaman had only two pages of her Budget speech unread when she appeared uneasy and was seen wiping sweat from her forehead.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Customs duty on imported footwear, furniture hiked
economic.content: In her second Budget presentation, the finance minister also imposed health cess on import of medical equipment.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM Nirmala Sitharaman scraps dividend distribution tax
economic.content: Short term capital gains are taxed at 15 percent of total gains for equity holdings less than a year. Capital assets in this category include listed equity shares, ETF (exchange traded fund) and equity-oriented mutual funds

economic.title: Budget 2020: Tax benefit for the housing loans extended for another year
economic.content: Section 80EEA  offered an additional Rs 1.5 lakh towards the interest payment on home loans

economic.title: Budget 2020: No tax exemption, HDFC Life, SBI Life, ICICI Pru plunge 9-10%
economic.content: Insurers were expecting a hike tax exemption limit for pension products, brokerages had said.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Centre rolls out new process of instant allotment of PAN through Aadhaar
economic.content: The move, she said, is aimed at further easing the process of allotment of PAN by eliminating the need to fill up detailed documents.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Customs duty reduced on telecom equipment in positive move for telcos
economic.content: The customs duty on footwear and furniture is going to be reduced as well

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt abolishes DDT; experts see more participation from investors
economic.content: The abolition of DDT was among the most expected moves that the market was anticipating from the Budget 2020.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Dividend distribution tax shifted to individuals instead of firms: FM
economic.content: In her second Budget presentation, the Finance Minister said concessional tax rate of 15 per cent has been extended to power generation companies.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM Nirmala Sitharaman sets new record for the longest Union Budget speech
economic.content: As of 1.30 pm, FM Nirmala Sitharaman's speech had already gone on for over two hours and 27 minutes — breaking her own record of 2 hours and 17 minutes from July 2019

economic.title: Budget 2020: Tax holiday for affordable housing extended by a year
economic.content: The deadline for approval of projects also extended to March 31, 2021.

economic.title: FMCG stocks gain after FM lowers income tax rates
economic.content: Tax rate cut will provide more money in consumer hands and will boost consumer expenditure.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Tax holiday for affordable housing extended by a year
economic.content: The deadline for approval of projects also extended to March 31, 2021.

economic.title: FMCG stocks gain after FM lowers income tax rates
economic.content: Tax rate cut will provide more money in consumer hands and will boost consumer expenditure.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM announces new direct tax dispute settlement scheme
economic.content: The announcement will help bridge the fiscal deficit gap and monetise a part of the amount stuck in tax litigation

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM Nirmala Sitharaman moots LIC IPO; govt to sell part stake in insurance major
economic.content: In October 2019, LIC Chairman MR Kumar had said there is no plan for listing LIC and it was too early for the country’s largest insurance firm to go public.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt to promote 'Study in India'; to start IND-SAT exam for Asian, African students
economic.content: The Finance Minister said that IND-SAT exam will be held in Asian and African countries to provide scholarships for foreign students to study in Indian universities.

economic.title: Budget 2020: New tax slabs without exemptions announced
economic.content: For someone earning Rs 15 lakh, the tax payable will come down from Rs 2,73,000 to Rs 1,95,000

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt announces Rs 8,000cr outlay for national mission on quantum tech
economic.content: The Ministry of Electronics and IT has signed an agreement with Israel for joint research in 27 possible areas which includes quantum computing as one of the potential segments.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Clean, reliable, robust financial sector key to achieve $5 trillion economy: FM
economic.content: Presenting the Budget for 2020-21, Sitharaman said robust mechanism is in place to monitor health of all commercial banks and asserted that depositors' money is absolutely safe.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM Nirmala Sitharaman quotes Tamil poet-saint Avvaiyar in speech; who is she?
economic.content: Avvaiyar is said to have written couplets, or single quotes, for each letter of the Tamil alphabet. The collection of these single lines quotes is referred to as Athichudi.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Government to segregate Pension of its employees from those of others
economic.content: Government pension funds to be separated from other employee funds

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Plan to hike FPI limit in corporate bonds to 15% from 9%: FM
economic.content: In her second Budget presentation, the finance minister said certain government securities will be open for foreign investors.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Fiscal deficit pegged at 3.8%, in line with street estimates
economic.content: For the financial year 2020-21, the fiscal deficit target has been set at 3.5 percent.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman says LIC to be listed
economic.content: The government proposes to sell a part of its holding in LIC through initial public offer, she said while unveiling Budget 2020-21.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt to raise fund via LIC IPO; LIC Housing Finance gains 5%
economic.content: The government plans to raise funds through LIC initial public offering.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt allots Rs 30,757 crore for Jammu & Kashmir, Rs 6,000 crore for Ladakh
economic.content: Following the abrogation of Article 370 on August 5, 2019, the state of Jammu and Kashmir was converted into a UT.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt proposes allocation of Rs 4,400cr for clean air in FY21, to incentivise states
economic.content: FM Sitharaman also confirmed that India's commitment under the Paris Agreement action will kick-in from January 1, 2021 and that "power plants with higher emissions will have to be closed"

economic.title: Budget 2020: IDBI Bank share price jumps 17% after govt proposes stake sale
economic.content: The stock opened at Rs 35.50 against the previous day's close at Rs 33.90 and touched the intraday high and low of Rs 39.80 and Rs 33.65, respectively.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt pegs nominal GDP growth at 10% for FY21
economic.content: The Economic Survey 2020-21 presented in Parliament on January 31 pegged economic growth in the range of 6 percent to 6.5 percent.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Companies Act to be amended to decriminalise civil offences: FM
economic.content: In her second Budget presentation, the finance minister said tax harassment cannot be tolerated and added that wealth creators will be respected in the country.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM proposes to increase turnover of GeM platform to Rs 3 lakh cr
economic.content: The ministry launched Government e-Marketplace (GeM), an online platform for public procurement, in August 2016 with the objective of creating an open and transparent procurement platform for government departments.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FY21 fiscal deficit set at 3.8% of GDP
economic.content: In the pre-Budget interactions, economists had advised Sitharaman and Prime Minister Narendra Modi to leave aside fiscal concerns and embark on an expanded expenditure programme to revive the economy

economic.title: Budget 2020: Fertiliser stocks fall as FM pushes for use of organic fertilisers
economic.content: Horticulture exceeds the production of food grains in India, says FM.

economic.title: Budget 2020: To bring in national policy on official statistics, says FM Sitharaman
economic.content: During her Budget speech, the finance minister said there is a growing need for Indian statistical systems to meet the growing challenges of a real-time monitoring of our increasingly complex economy

economic.title: Apple to shut down all official stores in Chinese mainland due to virus outbreak
economic.content: Apple did not immediately respond to further request for comment.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Large solar power capacity alongside rail track to be set up: Nirmala Sitharaman
economic.content: Presenting the Union Budget, she said that the Delhi-Mumbai Expressway will be completed by 2023 and that the Chennai-Bengaluru Expressway will also be launched.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Deposit insurance cover increased to Rs 5 lakh
economic.content: Sitharaman added that there is robust mechanism in place to monitor health of all scheduled commercial banks and all depositors money is safe in the country.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Centre to allow NBFCs to extend invoice financing To MSMEs
economic.content: In 2019-20, MSME ministry's allocation stood at Rs 7,011 crore. There is a 71 percent rise over and above the budgetary allocation made last year.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Task force to be set up for recommending marriageable age for women: FM
economic.content: Presenting the Budget for 2020-21, Sitharaman said Rs 9,500 crore has been provided for senior citizens and Divyangs, while Rs 35,600 crore has been allocated for nutrition related programme in FY21.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Deposits up to Rs 5 lakh insured
economic.content: FM assures customers of scheduled commercial banks that deposits are safe.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman says 5 archaeological sites to be developed as iconic sites
economic.content: The sites identified for the initiative are Raki Garhi in Haryana, Hastinapur in UttarPradesh , ShivSagar in Assam, Dholavira in Gujarat, and Adichanaluru in Tamil Nadu.

economic.title: Kunal Kamra sends legal notice to IndiGo over flying ban, seeks Rs 25 lakh in compensation
economic.content: Kamra has sought a revocation of the six-month suspension, along with an unconditional apology from Indigo

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt to launch scheme for exporters to reimburse state levies this year, says Nirmala Sitharaman
economic.content: It is proposed to digitally refund to exporters, duties and taxes levied at the centre, state, and local levels, she said while presenting the Union Budget for 2020-21.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Rs 103 lakh cr infra projects launched under NIP; logistic Policy to come soon: FM
economic.content: Presenting the Union Budget in Parliament, Sitharaman said Rs 1.7 lakh crore has been provided for transport infrastructure in 2020-21.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | BharatNet gets Rs 6,000cr allocation, new policy on data centre parks on anvil
economic.content: With focus on new economy models based on new-age technologies like artificial intelligence (AI) and Internet of Things (IoT), the government also intends to bring out a policy to enable private sector to build data centre parks throughout the country, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said while presenting the Union Budget for 2020-21.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Power stocks light up on Rs 22k-cr allocation for the sector
economic.content: A total allocation of Rs 22,000 crore will be given to the power and renewable sector, said Sitharaman.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | New scheme to boost domestic manufacturing of mobile phones, electronic equipment: FM
economic.content: "I propose a scheme focussed on the manufacturing of mobile phones, electronic equipment and semiconductor packaging. The details will be announced soon," Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said while presenting the Budget for 2020-21.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Girl enrollment ratio in education surpasses boys; FM hails Beti Bachao Beti Padhao scheme
economic.content: She said that gross enrollment ratio of girls at all levels of education across the country is higher than that for boys.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman says Rs 22,000cr outlay for power, renewable energy sector in FY21
economic.content: In her second Budget presentation, the finance minister said the Centre has proposed that discoms should replace conventional meters with smart pre-paid meters and give option to consumers to choose electricity suppliers.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Government to launch 'Krishi Udaan' scheme to bolster agri exports
economic.content: This was announced as part of the minister's 16-point plan targetted at doubling farmers' income by 2022.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | All ministries to issue quality standard orders: FM Sitharaman
economic.content: "In September last year, I had called for a time-bound adoption by industry of all necessary mandatory technical standards and their effective enforcement. All ministries during the course of this year be issuing quality standards orders," she said while presenting the Budget for 2020-21.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman says 100 more airports to be developed by 2025 to support UDAN scheme
economic.content: Presenting the Budget for 2020-21, Sitharaman said Rs 1.7 lakh crore has been provided for transport infrastructure in 2020-21.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | NIRVIK scheme to provide high insurance cover for exporters: FM Nirmala Sitharaman
economic.content: "To achieve higher export credit disbursement, a new scheme NIRVIK is being launched which provides for high insurance cover, reduction in premium for small exporters and simplified procedures for claim settlements," she said while presenting Budget 2020-21 here.

economic.title: Finolex Industries share price rises 4% after FM allocates Rs 3.6 lakh cr for Jal Jivan Mission
economic.content: Finolex Industries was quoting at Rs 579.60, up Rs 19.40, or 3.46 percent.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM proposes National Technical Textile Mission at Rs 1,480cr outlay
economic.content: Presenting the Budget for 2020-21, Sitharaman said as much as Rs 27,300 crore has been provided for development and promotion of industry and commerce.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Nirmala Sitharaman proposes scheme for manufacturing cell phones, semi conductors, electronic devices
economic.content: In her second Budget presentation, the finance minister said, India needs to boost domestic manufacturing and attract investment in electronic manufacturing.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM proposes a national logistics policy; sectoral stocks jump up to 7%
economic.content: The minister also proposed setting up a 9,000-km economic corridor and 2,000-km of coastal road.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM Nirmala Sitharaman quotes Kashmiri poet
economic.content: During her Budget speech, she quoted a verse from a poem 'Myon watan' by prominent 20th century Kashmiri poet Dinanath Nadim.

economic.title: Coronavirus can be treated with cow urine, dung: Hindu Mahasabha chief
economic.content: This comes at a time when one case of novel coronavirus has been confirmed in Kerala, India

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt announces Rs 18,600 crore Bengaluru Suburban Transportation Project, says FM Sitharaman
economic.content: According to the government, railway infrastructure would need an investment of Rs 50 lakh crore between 2018 and 2030.

economic.title: Nirbhaya case: Death row convict files mercy plea before President
economic.content: With this, the mercy pleas of two convicts stand rejected, one is pending before the President and the fourth is yet to file one.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Hospital stocks gain 1-2% as govt allocates Rs 69,000 cr for healthcare sector
economic.content: Government is planning to set up more hospitals under 'Ayushman' scheme, said FM.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Sitharaman quotes Kashmiri poet in speech: Who is Dina Nath Kaul?
economic.content: Dina Nath was awarded the Nehru award in 1971 or his writing, and honoured with Sahitya Academy Award for Shihul Kul – a collection of his poems.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt to launch Krishi Udaan for national, international transport of agri products
economic.content: Indian Railways will set up Kisan Rail in public-private partnership mode for cold-supply chain to transport perishable goods.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt to start online degree programmes for underprivileged students, says FM Sitharaman
economic.content: The finance minister allocated Rs 99,300 crore for the education sector for financial year 2020-21

economic.title: Budget 2020: Rural push may help revive demand for FMCG companies
economic.content: The Finance Minister proposed to change the existing regime that promotes excessive use of chemical fertilisers

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Sitharaman proposes Kisan Rail in PPP mode for cold supply chain to transport perishable goods
economic.content: "To build a seamless national cold supply chain for perishables, the Indian Railways will set up Kisan Rail through PPP model so that perishable goods can be transported quickly," she said.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt expands PM KUSUM scheme for solar pumps, targets to cover 20 lakh farmers
economic.content: While presenting the budget for 2020-21, the minister said that 15 lakh farmers would be provided funds to set up grid-connected 15 lakh solar pumps.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM announces funding fine print for National Infrastructure Pipeline (NIP)
economic.content: With a continued focus on urban infrastructure, schemes such as AMRUT, Smart Cities mission and affordable housing will need an investment of Rs. 16 lakh crores until 2025.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Railways to set up Kisan Rail under PPP model
economic.content: Kisan Rail will help transport of perishable goods such as milk, meat and fish, Sitharaman said.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt to launch campaign to eliminate TB by 2025: Nirmala Sitharaman
economic.content: The finance minister further said viability gap funding will be provided for setting up hospitals in districts with no empanelled hospitals under Ayushman Bharat and also to set up warehouses for agri products.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM proposes 5 new Smart Cities
economic.content: The allocation for the Smart Cities Mission is Rs 6,450 crore for 2020-21, same as last year.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt to launch 'village storage scheme' for women in villages to regain 'Dhaanya Lakshmi' status
economic.content: FM Sitharaman listed a 16-point action plan for farmers in her budget speech towards the goal of doubling farmers' income by 2022.

economic.title: Govt to expand fish production capacity; Avanti Feeds, Zeal Aqua up 5-16%
economic.content: Finance Minister said that government is going to expand fish production capacity to 200 lakh tonnes

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman says states asked to adopt 3 central model laws on agri land leasing, contract farming
economic.content: Besides, the Centre also proposes plans to help farmers use proper manure and little water and encourage balanced use of fertilisers, the minister said.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Govt to help farmers set up solar power units; Shakti Pumps gains 13%
economic.content: The government is expanding 'PM Kusum Scheme' to 20 lakh farmers to set up solar pumps.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | Govt sets agricultural credit target at Rs 15 lakh cr for FY21: FM Sitharaman
economic.content: She further said Indian Railways will set up Kisan Rail in public–private partnership (PPP) mode for cold supply chain to transport perishable goods.

economic.title: Toyota Kirloskar sales down 41% at 7,122 units in January
economic.content: In the domestic market, the company reported sales of 5,804 units last month, down 48 per cent from 11,221 units in January 2019, TKM said in a statement.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman says FDI in India rises to $284 bn during 2014-19
economic.content: "India's FDI got elevated to the level of USD 284 billion during 2014-19 from USD 190 billion that came in during the years 2009-14," she said.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman claims India uplifted 271 mn people out of poverty
economic.content: In her second Budget presentation, the finance minister said the Budget for 2020-21, is woven around aspirational India, economic development and caring society.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Ayushman Bharat to be expanded, health sector gets Rs 69,000 crore allocation
economic.content: The expansion of Ayushman Bharat scheme will see setting up and development of more hospitals in Tier-II, Tier-III cities under the PPP model.

economic.title: Budget 2020: FM Nirmala Sitharaman says India now 5th largest economy globally
economic.content: Presenting the Union Budget for 2020-21, she said growth of 7.4 percent was surpassed in 2014-19 with average inflation of 4.5 percent.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman says simplified return for GST from April 2020
economic.content: "Average household now saves 4 per cent in monthly expense after the rollout of GST," Sitharaman said, and added that the Budget for 2020-21 aims to fulfil aspirations of people.

economic.title: Nation-wide strike impacts banking services at PSU banks
economic.content: The strike call has been given by the United Forum of Bank Unions (UFBU), an umbrella body of nine bank unions, including All India Bank Officers' Confederation (AIBOC), All India Bank Employees Association (AIBEA) and National Organisation of Bank Workers (NOBW) to press for wage revision pending since November 2017.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | FM Nirmala Sitharaman says fundamentals of economy strong, inflation well contained
economic.content: Presenting the Union Budget for 2020-21, she said it is aimed at boosting income and purchasing power of people.

economic.title: GST Budget 2020: FM Sitharaman pays homage to Arun Jaitley, hails his 'historic' GST reform
economic.content: Arun Jaitley, who passed away in August 2019, was the Finance Minister when the GST system was introduced in July 2017.

economic.title: Maruti Suzuki Jan sales increases 1.6%, beat estimates
economic.content: Passenger car sales increased 9 percent to 1.11 lakh units year-on-year in January 2019.

economic.title: Synchronized action of central banks have helped world economy says IMF MD
economic.content: "We are in a better place in comparison to October, but the growth remains sluggish and we see risks still tilted to the downside. Why we believe we are in a better place? We saw reduction of trade tensions prior to Davos and in Davos and trade tensions were weighting quite severely on growth prospects," Georgieva told a group of reporters here on Friday.

economic.title: Canara Bank MD, CEO R A Sankara Narayanan retires
economic.content: "RA Sankara Narayanan, Managing Director & CEO of the Bank has retired from the services of the Bank on 31st January 2020, on his attaining the age of superannuation," Canara Bank said in a filing to BSE.

economic.title: D-Street Buzz: FMCG stocks jump ahead of Union Budget; HUL, ITC, Emami among top support
economic.content: In terms of index contribution, HUL, ITC, Godrej Corp, Emami, Colgate and GlaxoSmithKline Consumer Healthcare were at the top.

economic.title: Gas stocks in focus ahead of Union Budget; Mahanagar Gas; Gujarat
economic.content: Inclusion of natural gas under Goods and Services Tax would be positive, said brokerages.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Auto stocks in focus as govt may cut personal income tax rates
economic.content: The Government could increase the rural spending in the budget which would have a positive impact on demand for tractors and two-wheelers.

economic.title: HUL gains over 2% after Q3 results
economic.content: Given the company’s best earnings growth visibility in the large-cap Indian consumer space and by far the highest return ratios, the premium valuations are justified, Motilal Oswal said.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Cabinet approves Union Budget
economic.content: Before coming to Parliament for presenting her second budget, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman and her team met President Ram Nath Kovind.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Realty stocks gain led by Indiabulls Real Estate; HUL up 2%, autos rise
economic.content: The most active stocks were IRCTC, Reliance Industries, State Bank of India, Hindustan Unilever and Tata Motors.

economic.title: January sales at 3,130 units, February numbers may be hit by coronavirus disruption: MG Motor
economic.content: Commenting on January sales performance, MG Motor India Chief Commercial Officer Gaurav Gupta said, "The robust sales momentum of our first offering, the Hector, has been very encouraging."

economic.title: IHCL adds 24 hotels to portfolio so far this fiscal: CEO
economic.content: "So far in the current fiscal, we have signed 24 hotels with an inventory of over 2,800 keys. We will be signing a few more this quarter taking the total to more than last year's numbers.

economic.title: Income Tax Budget 2020 LIVE Updates: Government intends to remove all I-T exemptions in the long run, FM Sitharaman
economic.content: FM announces new income tax slabs/rates, tweaks exemption structure. Cuts tax rate for those in the Rs 5-15 lakh tax bracket.

economic.title: Kafeel Khan remanded in judicial custody, transferred to Mathura jail
economic.content: Circle Officer (Civil Lines) Anil Samania said Khan was brought here late Friday evening and was produced before the remand magistrate who remanded him to judicial custody.

economic.title: Power Grid share price cracks 5% after Q3 earnings
economic.content: The company's shares slipped even though the company's numbers were in line with expectations.

economic.title: Escorts January sales almost in-line with estimates, rise 1.2%
economic.content: Domestic tractor sales in January grew by 1.4 percent to 5,845 units, but exports declined 4.8 percent YoY to 218 units during the month.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Fertiliser stocks in focus; National Fertilisers up 3%
economic.content: The commerce ministry has suggested its finance counterpart to rationalise basic customs duty on over 300 items to boost domestic manufacturing and cut in the rising import bill.

economic.title: Indostar Capital Finance share price gains on Everstone investment
economic.content: The investment remains subject to receipt of regulatory approvals and satisfaction of other closing conditions.

economic.title: Amber Enterprises share price climbs 3%; Emkay remains bullish after strong Q3 results
economic.content: Amber continued its strong performance, beating revenue estimate by 30 percent, with Room Air Conditioner (RAC) volumes growing at 35 percent YoY.

economic.title: Divis Labs share price gains 2% after no USFDA observations for Chippada unit
economic.content: The company's Unit-II in Andhra Pradesh inspected by the US Food and Drug Administration in the last week on January.

economic.title: Economic Survey 2020: How much does it translate into actionable ideas?
economic.content: Authored by Chief Economic Adviser Krishnamurthy Subramanian and his team, the Survey serves as the official report of the economy and as a policy guide. The government is not bound to follow these recommendations.

economic.title: Tech Mahindra share price slips 3% post Q3 results; Motilal Oswal remains positive
economic.content: The company's earnings per share (EPS) was at Rs 13.13 against Rs 13.55 YoY and Rs 12.88 QoQ.

economic.title: Congress hopes Union Budget will provide relief to salaried class, invest in rural India
economic.content: Congress chief spokesperson Randeep Surjewala said the last budget led to crashing consumption levels, soaring unemployment and falling GDP.

economic.title: SBI reports highest every quarterly profit in Q3: What should investors do now?
economic.content: State Bank of India expects better profitability in Q4 as well, led by better asset-quality trend, one-off gains from SBI Cards and lower tax.

economic.title: Gold price today: Yellow metal trades above Rs 41,000; next target seen at Rs 41,250
economic.content: Experts are of the view that the yellow metal is likely to head higher towards Rs 41,250. Supports are placed at Rs 40,800 level.

economic.title: Economic Survey highlights market dynamism, shows one-third of Sensex stocks are replaced every 5 years
economic.content: The relationship between pro-business policy and creative destruction is mirrored in the composition of the Sensex over the years, the Survey said.

economic.title: 32 lakh houses completed and delivered under PMAY(U), says Economic Survey 2020
economic.content: investment made under PMAY(U) not only provides pucca houses to the eligible families to achieve the goal of 'Housing for All' but also triggers multiplier effect on the overall economy

economic.title: Qantas suspends China flights from February 9 due to coronavirus
economic.content: The Australian national carrier's direct flights from Sydney to Beijing and Sydney to Shanghai will be halted until March 29, it said in a statement published Saturday.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Bahi khata is back as FM Nirmala Sitharaman leaves North Block
economic.content: In 2019, Sitharaman gave an Indian touch to the Budgetary exercise, by carrying the Budget documents to Parliament in ‘bahi-khata’.

economic.title: Budget 2020 LIVE stream: Here's how, when and where to watch FM Nirmala Sitharaman's Union Budget speech online today
economic.content: Budget 2020-21 will be the first full-fledged budget of the Narendra Modi-led government after getting re-elected in May 2019

economic.title: Britain replaces Claire Perry O'Neill as president of UN climate summit
economic.content: Claire Perry O'Neill, a former energy minister who since last summer had been leading the team running the summit, known as COP26, said she was "very sad" at the news and appeared to question the government's level of preparedness.

economic.title: Finance Commission's interim report may raise the topic of devolution
economic.content: States currently receive 42 percent of the Centre's divisible tax pool,

economic.content: Here are the most significant changes in the Budgets presented by the Modi government.

economic.title: Budget 2020: Why markets remain open on Budget days
economic.content: Despite being a Saturday, the National Stock Exchange (NSE) and BSE will remain open for trading

economic.title: Budget 2020: 'Opt for unconventional covered call cum ratio spread in Bank Nifty'
economic.content: Higher option premium suggesting that upside movement should be captured with the help of futures and options should be used as a hedging instrument in the strategy

economic.title: Budget 2020 Sensex Challenge: Win Cruise tickets to DECMA 2020
economic.content: The sixth edition of the DECMA conference in 2020 is a 2 day residential conference on a cruise over the weekend, scheduled from Saturday 14th March to Monday (morning) 16th March.

economic.title: Budget 2020: One time restructuring scheme could help real estate projects
economic.content: Liquidity crisis triggered by default in one of the large NBFCs in 2018 has literally choked off flow of funds from NBFCs to real estate, leading to defaults

economic.title: Chronology of Brexit as the UK leaves the European Union
economic.content: January 23, 2013: Prime Minister David Cameron promises an in-out referendum on EU membership if his Conservative Party wins the 2015 General Election.

economic.title: Budget 2020 bahi khata: Will FM Sitharaman continue the practice?
economic.content: The practice of carrying the Gladstone Box is still followed in the United Kingdom.

economic.title: India witnessing inclusive, all-round development under PM Modi: J P Nadda
economic.content: "Today's address by President Ram Nath Kovind is a historical document which presents the picture of developing India at the fast speed under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi," Nadda said.

economic.title: Proposal to give 75% of pvt jobs in Haryana to youth of the state discussed in Cabinet meeting
economic.content: Deputy Chief Minister and JJP leader Dushyant Chautala, whose party had made the key poll promise, issued a statement saying it was also decided in the meeting that the matter will be referred to the Legal Remembrancer for an opinion and will also be discussed with the state's industrialists.

economic.title: PM Modi 24-karat gold, don't doubt his intention: Rajnath Singh
economic.content: "Our Prime Minister is 24-karat. His intention cannot be doubted," he said, adding that his government believes in 'Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas and Sabka Vishwas'.

economic.title: Budget 2020 Expectations: What to expect on income tax
economic.content: Reports suggest the government may allow tax saving via infrastructure bonds of up to Rs 50,000 a year

economic.title: Govt nets Rs 1.1 lakh cr from GST in January
economic.content: The GST collection is in line with the target set by Revenue Secretary Ajay Bhushan Pandey after a high-level meeting with senior tax officials earlier this month.

economic.title: Market Headstart: Indices head into Budget with caution; use dips to buy today
economic.content: Trends on SGX Nifty indicate a negative opening for the broader index in India, with a 52 points loss or 0.43 percent. The Nifty futures were trading around 11,987-level on the Singaporean Exchange.

economic.title: Budget 2020 | State spend on infra, tax incentives likely to push growth
economic.content: FInance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman is expected to announce plans to spend over Rs 102 trillion on roads, ports, airports, irrigation and other infrastructure over the next five years.

economic.title: Coronavirus Outbreak: US announces health emergency, bars non-citizens who visited China
economic.content: Americans who visited other parts of mainland China will undergo special health screening upon their return, followed by up to 14 days of "monitored self-quarantine," under the temporary restrictions.

economic.title: Coronavirus Outbreak: Here is a look at the likely impact on companies
economic.content: Various businesses across sectors have felt the impact of the coronavirus. Here are a few:

economic.title: Donald Trump curbs immigration for 6 nations in election-year push
economic.content: Officials said immigrants from Kyrgyzstan, Myanmar, Eritrea, Nigeria, Sudan and Tanzania will face new restrictions in obtaining certain visas to come to the United States. But it is not a total travel ban, unlike President Donald Trump's earlier effort that generated outrage around the world for unfairly targeting Muslims.

economic.title: Coronavirus outbreak: Air India flight evacuating 324 Indians from China's Wuhan land in Delhi
economic.content: The flight had departed from Delhi airport at 1.17 pm on January 31 to evacuate Indian nationals from China

economic.title: Indian economy experienced abrupt slowdown in 2019, but it's not in a recession: IMF MD
economic.content: "The Indian economy indeed has experienced an abrupt slowdown in 2019. We had to revise our growth projections, downwards to four percent for last year. We are expecting 5.8 per cent (growth rate) in 2020 and then an upward trajectory to 6.5 percent in 2021," Georgieva told a group of foreign journalists here on Friday.

economic.title: SBI posts record profit in Q3, but slump in loan growth and elevated slippages demand caution
TVS Apache RR 310 vs KTM RC390: Tech specs comparison
economic.content: The 2020 Apache RR 310 gets a price of Rs 2.4 lakh and with that competes with the likes of the KTM RC390.

economic.title: US-UK trade deal needs labour, climate protections, enforcement: US lawmaker
economic.content: Neal, a Democrat, said he expected to work closely with U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer in forging a new U.S.-UK trade deal after Britain's left the European Union on Friday.

economic.title: As coronavirus misinformation spreads on social media, Facebook removes posts
economic.content: The coronavirus outbreak has stoked a wave of anti-China sentiment around the globe. Hoaxes have spread widely online, promoted by conspiracy theorists and exacerbated by a dearth of information from the cordoned-off zone around China's central city of Wuhan, where the outbreak began.

economic.title: Donald Trump signs executive order aimed at preventing sales of counterfeit goods from overseas
economic.content: Presidential trade adviser Peter Navarro urged Amazon, Walmart and digital commerce sites to take steps to ensure that the goods they sell are safe and legal.

economic.title: Coronavirus outbreak: Death toll in China rises to 259, total cases surge to nearly 12,000
economic.content: The total confirmed cases surged to 11,791

economic.title: Brexit: United Kingdom formally leaves the European Union
economic.content: Britain's Union Jack was removed from lines of EU member state flags at the European Council and European Parliament buildings in Brussels

economic.title: Cash Market | A bullish quadruple breakout pattern in Ujjivan
economic.content: Ujjivan has been a consistent outperformer and is bullish on the ratio chart and on the verge of a bullish quadruple breakout pattern.

economic.title: Cash Market | A low risk high reward trade in Rail Vikas Nigam
economic.content: RVNL has seen a sharp rally resulting in a breakout. It has corrected on low volumes with a strong possibility of resumption of the trend.

economic.title: Budget 2020: What changed for the market while you were sleeping? Top 12 things to know
economic.content: Trends on SGX Nifty indicate a negative opening for the broader index in India, with a 52 points loss or 0.43 percent.

economic.title: Cash Market | A high volume breakout trade in Birlasoft
economic.content: Birlasoft has closed at a six month, high breaking previous resistance on high volume. The stock is seeking higher ground.

economic.title: Options Trade | An options trade in Nifty for Budget day
economic.content: A double ratio spread trade in Nifty on the high volatility budget day. The trade can be carried forward.

economic.title: Stocks in the news: HUL, ITC, Divis Lab, Castrol, Power Grid, JSPL, IndoStar Capital
economic.content: HUL | ITC | Vedanta | Castrol | Power Grid | Amara Raja Batteries and J&K Bank are among the stocks that are in the news today.

economic.title: Closing Bell: Investors give thumbs down as Sensex crashes almost 1000 pts; ITC, HDFC top losers
economic.content: All sectoral indices are trading in the red with the auto, infra and the metal index being the top losers.

economic.title: Wall Street drops as virus outbreak, data stoke growth worry
economic.content: The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 525.63 points, or 1.82%, to 28,333.81, the S&P 500 lost 48.35 points, or 1.47%, to 3,235.31 and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 110.89 points, or 1.19%, to 9,188.05.

economic.title: Budget 2020 LIVE updates: Defence budget hiked by 6% to Rs 3.3 lakh crore
economic.content: Govt to raise funds via listing of LIC; Deposit insurance raised to Rs 5 lakh; FY21 fiscal deficit target pegged at 3.5% of GDP;  DDT scrapped; cuts income tax on lower slabs

economic.title: Shimla receives highest snowfall this January in 8 years
economic.content: In Shimla district this year, Jubbal got 38.5 cm snowfall, Theog 82 cm, Khadrala 160.5 cm, Sarahan 81 cm, Kotkhai 32 cm and Mashobra 47.5 cm.

economic.title: Domestic biz helped RPG Life Sciences report 49% YoY rise in Q3 net profit
economic.content: Domestic business constitutes about two-thirds of company’s revenues grew at 23 percent, and international sales that constitute the rest grew by 26 percent.

economic.title: Karnataka CM Yediyurappa gets approval for cabinet expansion, may induct 13 ministers
economic.content: Yediyurappa had been persistent on his demands with the central leadership, which, by agreeing to many of them, appeared to be trying to maintain the advantage gained in the southern state under the popular Veerashaiva-Lingayat leader.

economic.title: Economic Survey cites Wikipedia as source to data in chapter on banks
economic.content: Citing Wikipedia as a source has earned the ire of netizens, who were surprised to see the citation in "one of the most important documents of the government".

economic.title: Google to launch new unified messaging app for business
economic.content: The new app will combine several standalone Google applications and technologies.

economic.title: Budget 2020 should boost consumer sentiments
economic.content: I am confident that budget 2020 will pack enough measures to boost the economy.

economic.title: Economic Survey 2020: Fund raising via public, rights issue up 67% in 9MFY20; private placement up 19%
economic.content: The resource mobilisation through public issue (equity) decreased in April-December 2019 compared to the similar period for previous year, continuing with the declining trend of last year.

economic.title: After success of Man vs Wild episode featuring PM Modi, Discovery ropes in noted Indian personalities
economic.content: Celebrities like Rajinikanth and Akshay Kumar will appear in the upcoming 14-part TV series.

economic.title: Get MC Pro for Re 1 by participating in this Twitter contest
economic.content: Simply tweet during the FM’s Budget speech from 11 am to 1.30pm on  February 1, 2020 using the hashtags #BudgetwithMC & #MCPro and don’t forget to tag @moneycontrolcom.
